comment: * Description of a single Header item that the user can select. * * @deprecated Use the AndroidX * * Preference Library for consistent behavior across all devices. * For more information on using the AndroidX Preference Library see * Settings.

variables.name: id
variables.comment:
* Identifier for this header, to correlate with a new list when
         * it is updated.  The default value is
         * {@link PreferenceActivity#HEADER_ID_UNDEFINED}, meaning no id.
         * @attr ref android.R.styleable#PreferenceHeader_id

variables.name: titleRes
variables.comment:
* Resource ID of title of the header that is shown to the user.
         * @attr ref android.R.styleable#PreferenceHeader_title

variables.name: title
variables.comment:
* Title of the header that is shown to the user.
         * @attr ref android.R.styleable#PreferenceHeader_title

variables.name: summaryRes
variables.comment:
* Resource ID of optional summary describing what this header controls.
         * @attr ref android.R.styleable#PreferenceHeader_summary

variables.name: summary
variables.comment:
* Optional summary describing what this header controls.
         * @attr ref android.R.styleable#PreferenceHeader_summary

variables.name: breadCrumbTitleRes
variables.comment:
* Resource ID of optional text to show as the title in the bread crumb.
         * @attr ref android.R.styleable#PreferenceHeader_breadCrumbTitle

variables.name: breadCrumbTitle
variables.comment:
* Optional text to show as the title in the bread crumb.
         * @attr ref android.R.styleable#PreferenceHeader_breadCrumbTitle

variables.name: breadCrumbShortTitleRes
variables.comment:
* Resource ID of optional text to show as the short title in the bread crumb.
         * @attr ref android.R.styleable#PreferenceHeader_breadCrumbShortTitle

variables.name: breadCrumbShortTitle
variables.comment:
* Optional text to show as the short title in the bread crumb.
         * @attr ref android.R.styleable#PreferenceHeader_breadCrumbShortTitle

variables.name: iconRes
variables.comment:
* Optional icon resource to show for this header.
         * @attr ref android.R.styleable#PreferenceHeader_icon

variables.name: fragment
variables.comment:
* Full class name of the fragment to display when this header is
         * selected.
         * @attr ref android.R.styleable#PreferenceHeader_fragment

variables.name: fragmentArguments
variables.comment:
* Optional arguments to supply to the fragment when it is
         * instantiated.

variables.name: intent
variables.comment: * Intent to launch when the preference is selected.

variables.name: extras
variables.comment: * Optional additional data for use by subclasses of PreferenceActivity.

methods.name: public CharSequence getTitle(Resources res)
methods.comment:
* Return the currently set title.  If {@link #titleRes} is set,
         * this resource is loaded from <var>res</var> and returned.  Otherwise
         * {@link #title} is returned.

methods.name: public CharSequence getSummary(Resources res)
methods.comment:
* Return the currently set summary.  If {@link #summaryRes} is set,
         * this resource is loaded from <var>res</var> and returned.  Otherwise
         * {@link #summary} is returned.

methods.name: public CharSequence getBreadCrumbTitle(Resources res)
methods.comment:
* Return the currently set bread crumb title.  If {@link #breadCrumbTitleRes} is set,
         * this resource is loaded from <var>res</var> and returned.  Otherwise
         * {@link #breadCrumbTitle} is returned.

methods.name: public CharSequence getBreadCrumbShortTitle(Resources res)
methods.comment:
* Return the currently set bread crumb short title.  If
         * {@link #breadCrumbShortTitleRes} is set,
         * this resource is loaded from <var>res</var> and returned.  Otherwise
         * {@link #breadCrumbShortTitle} is returned.

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(Parcel dest, int flags)

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(Parcel dest, int flags)
